metadata.name: Gwydion
metadata.description:
Gwydion, son of DÃ´n and Druid of the mainland gods is a magician, hero and trickster of Welsh mythology.
The name Gwydion may be interpreted as "Born of Trees" and he rules over music magic, illusion, changes, the sky, healing, help, learning, and mental powers.
His spirit lives on, to be encountered on the fells and in the ancient woodlands of Wales.

1080 MP4

With original soundtrack composed by Raphael Wildemann
